meanings.definition: To make a careless or stupid mistake.
meanings.sent1: He kept blundering through the math problems without understanding them.
meanings.sent2: She was blundering around the kitchen, knocking over pots and pans.
meanings.sent3: The blundering student accidentally erased the entire whiteboard instead of one word.
meanings.sent4: His blundering attempts at fixing the leak only made it worse.
meanings.sent5: The blundering detective missed the crucial clue right in front of him.

meanings.definition: Clumsy or awkward in movement or manner.
meanings.sent1: The blundering puppy tripped over its own paws.
meanings.sent2: She felt blundering as she tried to dance in high heels for the first time.
meanings.sent3: The blundering waiter spilled soup on the customer's lap.
meanings.sent4: The blundering robot bumped into walls as it tried to navigate the room.
meanings.sent5: His blundering attempts to juggle ended with balls rolling everywhere.

meanings.sent1: The blundering of forgetting his keys made him late for work.
meanings.sent2: Her blundering in the presentation caused confusion among the audience.
meanings.sent3: The blundering of using salt instead of sugar ruined the cake.
meanings.sent4: The blundering of sending the email to the wrong person led to a mix-up.
meanings.sent5: His blundering in the negotiation cost the company a valuable contract.
